long_description: The REI Nightlight travel clock provides convenient and reliable rousing during business trips, worldwide vacations and car-camping adventures. LED-illuminated display provides simple nighttime viewing and use as a nightlight; push-button boost offers flashlight capability. Large digital display is easy to read. Four-minute snooze is great for lazy days. Runs on three AAA batteries, included.
short_description: The REI Nightlight travel clock provides convenient and reliable rousing during business trips, worldwide vacations and car-camping adventures.
